Package com.hula.lang.runtime.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HulaPlayerException
    A checked exception thrown by the HulaPlayer which must be explicitly caught by the container.
    HulaRuntimeException
    An unchecked exception which occurs during the execution of a Hula Executable.
    NestedQuitException
    A special exception to allow us to quit all hula execution regardless of how many nested Call invocations have been made.
    UndefinedVariableException
    An exception caused by a reference in a Hula script to an unknown variable.
